schema.title: Response Question Answers Analysis Ai V1 Gloo AI Chat Sotc Question Answers Analysis Post

422.description: Invalid file format. Please upload a CSV file.

example.detail: Invalid file format. Please upload a CSV file.

requestBody.description: The request body should be a JSON object with the following structure:

example.content: This is the full text content that needs to be processed and indexed for search. It is the only required field.
author: Jane Doe
John Smith
example.item_summary: A brief summary of the document's content and purpose.

400.description: Bad Request - The request was improperly formatted.

401.description: Unauthorized - The JWT token is missing or invalid.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - The request is well-formed but contains semantic errors.

csvFile.title: CSV file containing data to analyze
csvFile.description: The first line of the CSV file should contain the header, and the second line should contain the national average. The rest of the file should contain the data to analyze.

nationalCsvFile.title: CSV file containing the national church metrics data
nationalCsvFile.description: Upload a CSV file containing the national church metrics data.

orgCsvFile.title: CSV file containing the organization church metrics data
orgCsvFile.description: Upload a CSV file containing the organization church metrics data (optional).

new_value.title: New Value
new_value.description: The new value for the field.

forceGenerate.title: Forcegenerate
forceGenerate.description: Force generation of a new response

ai_why_read.title: Ai Why Read
ai_why_read.description: Why this article is worth reading

chat_id.title: Chat Id
chat_id.description: chat_id can also be provided as a query param

stream.title: Stream
stream.description: Stream response as soon as tokens are generated by the model.

answers.title: Answers
answers.description: List of answers with their details as json objects

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: List of publishers to filter by

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Number of search results to return

model.title: Model
model.description: Model to use for generating responses

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: Messages to send to the LLM

max_tokens.title: Max Tokens
max_tokens.description: Max tokens to use for generating responses

stream.title: Stream
stream.description: Stream response as soon as tokens are generated by the model.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Temperature to use for generating responses

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: List of tools you want the LLM to leverage.

tool_choice.title: Tool Choice
tool_choice.description: Which tool your LLM should use among the list.

type.title: Type
type.description: This field must be the literal string function.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the chosen function to invoke.

function.description: The encapsulation of the chosen function to invoke.

type.title: Type
type.description: This field must be the literal string function.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: Whether to adhere strictly to the parameters definition.

publisher_id.description: UUID of the publisher associated with the content. This must be associated with your organization.

content.description: The actual text content to be ingested and chunked.

item_image.description: URL to image associated with the content.

item_file.description: URL to a file associated with the content.

item_number.description: Identifying number for the content item.

item_extra.description: Additional information about the content item.

item_tags.description: Tags associated with the content (can be array or comma-separated string).

author.description: Author(s) of the content (can be array or comma-separated string).

isbn.description: ISBN if content is from a book.

publication_date.description: Date when the content was published (recommended format: YYYY-MM-DD).

hosted_url.description: URL where the content is hosted.

detail.description: A human-readable description of the error.

bearerAuth.description: Bearer authentication header of the form Bearer `<token>`, where `<token>` is your [auth token](/studio/manage-api-credentials).
